channel.title: 742 RSA problem

item.title: 742 RSA problem
item.dc:creator: @Fabrice_L Fabrice L
item.description:
@Fabrice_L wrote:

If anyone could fix this, thanks alot

int rsaSize = buffer.readShort() & 0xffff; byte[] rsaData = new byte[rsaSize]; buffer.readBytes(rsaData); InStream rsaBuffer = new InStream(rsaData); //(Misc.cryptRSA(rsaData, EXPONENT, MODULUS)); if (rsaBuffer.readByte() != 10) { /** * Invalid RSA header key. */ System.out.println("Invalid RSA header key"); sendReturnCode(channel, 10); return null; }

On login, it keeps giving a not enough readable bytes error on the line buffer.readBytes(rsaData)

Read full topic
